title: 1997–98 Segunda Divisão B
text:
The 1997–98 <a href="Segunda%20Divis%C3%A3o">Segunda Divisão</a> season was the 64th season of the competition and the 48th season of recognised third-tier <a href="Association%20football">football</a> in <a href="Portugal">Portugal</a>.
Overview.
The league was contested by 54 teams in 3 divisions with <a href="Naval%201%C2%BA%20Maio">Naval 1º Maio</a>, <a href="AD%20Esposende">AD Esposende</a> and <a href="CD%20Santa%20Clara">CD Santa Clara</a> winning the respective divisional competitions and gaining promotion to the <a href="Liga%20de%20Honra">Liga de Honra</a>. The overall championship was won by <a href="CD%20Santa%20Clara">CD Santa Clara</a>.
